newsitem.title: USA: Sizzler to file reorganization plan by yr-end.
newsitem.headline: Sizzler to file reorganization plan by yr-end.

text.p: Sizzler International Inc said on Wednesday it planned to file a reorganization plan before year-end.

The company said it hopes to emerge from Chapter 11 by April 30, 1997, the end of the current fiscal year. As the reorganization plan proceeds, all restaurants will be closely monitored and are subject to review, the company said.
Sizzler filed for Chapter 11 bankruptcy protection in June.
It reported a second quarter loss of $0.02 per share on Wednesday, compared to a profit of $0.01 per share in the year ago period.
